title: Verify that the tenant not listed in staged_config.json doesn't get eca from sidecarsvc when signing byok cert
custom_steps:
1. Use tenant not in the staged_config for configuring byok
2. Check that the signing doesn't happen using sidecar svc
3. Check the ECA is not present in sidecarsvc using the api call
sudo curl -v -X GET --unix-socket /var/run/proxysidecar.socket -H "x-netskope-tenantid:6690" http://xxx/v1/cert/inlineca
custom_expected: Sidecarsvc is not used to configure BYOK
